home.title: Pokój Z Wami - Find a Room & Roommate | Apartment Rentals
home.description: Looking for a room or a roommate? Pokój Z Wami is the platform for apartment rentals, flatshares, and coliving in Poland. Find properties in Warsaw, Krakow, Wroclaw, and more.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Before you write to us — check, the answer might already be here

addListing.question: How can I list an apartment?
addListing.answer: After logging in, click 'List a Property', fill out the form, and publish. It takes less than 2 minutes.

shareRoom.question: Can I share an apartment with others?
shareRoom.answer: Yes! That's the main goal of our platform — you can search for roommates or join existing offers.

pricing.question: Is the platform free?
pricing.answer: Yes, browsing listings and searching for roommates is completely free.

roommate.question: How do I find the right roommate?
roommate.answer: Use our compatibility filters — lifestyle, interests, budget. You can also check profiles and reviews of other users.

moreQuestions.title: Still have questions?
moreQuestions.subtitle: Check our full FAQ list to find answers to all your doubts.

connectPeople.title: Connecting people looking for the perfect home
connectPeople.subtitle: With Pokój Z Wami you can create a seeker profile or list your apartment to find tenants.

hero.title: Need help or have questions?
hero.subtitle: We are here to help you with any questions or concerns.

q1.question: How can I find a roommate?
q1.answer: In the search bar, select "Find a Roommate" or "Join a Flat". You can filter offers by age, gender, lifestyle, and location.

q2.question: Can I see how many spots are left in an apartment?
q2.answer: Yes — every listing shows the current number of available spots and profiles of people already living there.

q3.question: How do I contact someone looking for a roommate?
q3.answer: After logging in, you can send a message directly from the listing. Remember to complete your profile – it increases your chance of acceptance.

q4.question: Can I add roommate preferences?
q4.answer: Yes, in the "Profile" section you can specify your preferences (e.g., quiet lifestyle, non-smoker, student, etc.), and the system will match listings automatically.

q1.question: How do I list a rental?
q1.answer: After logging in, click "List a Property", fill in the property details, add photos, and specify if the apartment is shareable. The listing will be visible immediately after approval.

q2.question: Can I list available rooms in an existing apartment?
q2.answer: Absolutely. In the form, select type "Room" and indicate the number of available spots. You can also describe who you are looking for (e.g., female student, professional, etc.).

q3.question: Can I set the sharing rules myself?
q3.answer: Yes, it's your listing – you can define preferences regarding roommates, house rules, shared utility costs, and other details.

q4.question: Does the platform charge a commission for rentals?
q4.answer: No. We do not charge any commission on transactions – contact between users is direct.

q1.question: Is using the platform free?
q1.answer: Yes. Searching for offers, adding listings, and contacting users is free. Fees may apply only for premium listing promotion services.

q2.question: How can I increase the visibility of my listing?
q2.answer: You can use the option to feature your offer, add premium photos, or verify your account — all these actions increase trust and visibility in search results.

q3.question: Do I need an account to browse listings?
q3.answer: No, you can browse listings without logging in. An account is only needed if you want to add your own listing or message another user.

q4.question: How can I report an inappropriate listing or user?
q4.answer: Under every listing, you will find a "Report" button. Our team verifies every report within 24 hours.

cta.title: Didn't find the answer to your question?
cta.subtitle: You can ask us anything. We are here to help you with any doubts.
